enumLongDescriptions.NISTB233: This value shall indicate the 'nistb233' curve in RFC5656.
enumLongDescriptions.NISTB409: This value shall indicate the 'nistb409' curve in RFC5656.
enumLongDescriptions.NISTK163: This value shall indicate the 'nistk163' curve in RFC5656.
enumLongDescriptions.NISTK233: This value shall indicate the 'nistk233' curve in RFC5656.
enumLongDescriptions.NISTK283: This value shall indicate the 'nistk283' curve in RFC5656.
enumLongDescriptions.NISTK409: This value shall indicate the 'nistk409' curve in RFC5656.
enumLongDescriptions.NISTP192: This value shall indicate the 'nistp192' curve in RFC5656.
enumLongDescriptions.NISTP224: This value shall indicate the 'nistp224' curve in RFC5656.
enumLongDescriptions.NISTP256: This value shall indicate the 'nistp256' curve in RFC5656.
enumLongDescriptions.NISTP384: This value shall indicate the 'nistp384' curve in RFC5656.
enumLongDescriptions.NISTP521: This value shall indicate the 'nistp521' curve in RFC5656.
enumLongDescriptions.NISTT571: This value shall indicate the 'nistt571' curve in RFC5656.

Key.description: The `Key` schema describes sensitive data for accessing devices or services.
Key.longDescription: This resource shall represent a key for a Redfish implementation.

enumLongDescriptions.DSA: This value shall indicate an RFC4253-defined 'ssh-dss' key type.
enumLongDescriptions.ECDSA: This value shall indicate an RFC5656-defined ECDSA key type.
enumLongDescriptions.Ed25519: This value shall indicate an RFC8709-defined 'ssh-ed25519' key type.
enumLongDescriptions.RSA: This value shall indicate an RFC4253-defined 'ssh-rsa' key type.

title: #Key.Key
